resources.string: 23 crore people in India go to bed hungry everyday.\nSource:TOI.
Our app aims to help you help some such needy people.
Click on the \'HELP\' button for directions to use the app!
We are delighted to have a superhero like you.

23 crore people in India go to bed hungry every day. Itâ€™s time for us to change these facts! Source: TOI. Our app will help you provide food to such needy people while getting attractive offers every time you donate!
a.Mark the location of a needy person if you spot someone.\nb. Donate food to any marked needy person near you.
Click on the \'UPLOAD\' button and upload a picture of the needy with a description. Tell the needy to wait there as food might be coming for them. You get 10 points every time you mark a location!

Click on any location on the map and our app will direct you to that location. When you reach the needy, open our forum and upload the picture of the food along with the needy. You get 20 points once that picture is verified by our other heroes!
You can also review other superheroes\' work and get points for reviewing it.
You can redeem our offers by going to our offered cafes and restaurants and showing them your points.\nReady to save humanity? Let\'s go!
Oops! Donero Says It Doesn\'t Recognize You
Oops! Donero Server Just Messed Up
Oops! Data Received Was An Unreadable Mess
"Your Locations Settings is set to 'Off'.\nPlease Enable Location to " + "use this app"
Welcome to the DONERO community! We are delighted to have a superhero like you.

23 crore people in India go to bed hungry every day. It\'s time for us to change these facts! Source: TOI Our app will help you provide food to some such NEEDY PEOPLE of your city while getting ATTRACTIVE OFFERS every time you donate!
Your job as a DONERO a. Mark the location of a needy person if you spot someone, OR b. Donate food to any marked needy person near you
a. Mark the location of a needy person if you spot someone, OR
b. Donate food to any marked needy person near you

Some other time, if you have extra food at your home, click on any location on the map and our app will direct you to the needy at that location. When you reach the needy, click a picture of them with the food you brought and it will be uploaded to our forum. You get 20 points every time you donate food!
You can redeem our offers by going to our offered cafes and restaurants and showing them your collected points.
Ready to make a change? Let\'s go!
